statements: SELECT * FROM earthquake_epicenters
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM earthquake_epicenters
SELECT * FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE magnitude > 5
SELECT id, date_time FROM earthquake_epicenters ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE magnitude < 4 ORDER BY date_time ASC
SELECT * FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE magnitude > 5 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE magnitude BETWEEN 4 AND 6 ORDER BY magnitude DESC, date_time ASC;
SELECT id, magnitude, date_time FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE magnitude > 5 AND latitude < 0 ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' AND magnitude < 5 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM earthquake_epicenters WHERE longitude < 0 OR magnitude > 6 ORDER BY longitude ASC, magnitude DESC, date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeEvents ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT location, magnitude FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE magnitude > 5;
SELECT event_id, location, magnitude FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE location LIKE 'California%';
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeEvents ORDER BY magnitude DESC;
SELECT visualization_name, map_data FROM MapVisualizations;
SELECT event_id, location, magnitude, time_stamp FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE magnitude > 5 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT visualization_id, visualization_name, map_data FROM MapVisualizations ORDER BY visualization_name
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE location LIKE 'California%' AND magnitude BETWEEN 4 AND 6
SELECT event_id, location, magnitude, time_stamp FROM EarthquakeEvents WHERE location = 'Japan' ORDER BY magnitude DESC
SELECT MAX(magnitude) AS max_magnitude, MIN(magnitude) AS min_magnitude, AVG(magnitude) AS avg_magnitude FROM EarthquakeEvents
SELECT * FROM epicenters;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM epicenters WHERE magnitude > 5;
SELECT event_id, epicenter_id, region_id, depth FROM earthquakes WHERE type = 'earthquake' ORDER BY depth DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT region_id, name, description FROM regions WHERE region_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM epicenters WHERE magnitude > 5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT epicenters.id, epicenters.latitude, epicenters.longitude, earthquakes.depth, earthquakes.type FROM epicenters JOIN earthquakes ON epicenters.id = earthquakes.epicenter_id WHERE earthquakes.type = 'Earthquake' AND epicenters.latitude < 0;
SELECT regions.name, COUNT(earthquakes.event_id) AS num_earthquakes FROM regions LEFT JOIN earthquakes ON regions.region_id = earthquakes.region_id GROUP BY regions.name HAVING num_earthquakes > 100;

SELECT epicenters.latitude, epicenters.longitude, regions.name AS region_name, earthquakes.depth AS earthquake_depth FROM epicenters JOIN regions ON epicenters.id = earthquakes.epicenter_id AND regions.region_id = earthquakes.region_id WHERE epicenters.magnitude > 6 AND earthquakes.depth > 50;

SELECT epicenters.id, epicenters.date AS event_date, regions.name AS region_name, earthquakes.type FROM epicenters JOIN regions ON epicenters.id = earthquakes.epicenter_id AND regions.region_id = earthquakes.region_id WHERE epicenters.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Earthquakes;
SELECT location, magnitude FROM Earthquakes ORDER BY magnitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM Epicenters WHERE epicenter_depth > 50;
SELECT epicenter_location, epicenter_date FROM Epicenters ORDER BY epicenter_date ASC;
SELECT map_name FROM Maps WHERE map_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, location, magnitude, date FROM Earthquakes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT epicenter_location, epicenter_depth FROM Epicenters WHERE epicenter_depth > 50 ORDER BY epicenter_depth ASC;
SELECT * FROM Maps WHERE map_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, time_period_name, start_date, end_date FROM TimePeriod WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, magnitude, date FROM Earthquakes WHERE magnitude > 7.0 ORDER BY magnitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude > 5
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude < 3 ORDER BY depth DESC
SELECT id, magnitude FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE depth < 100 ORDER BY magnitude ASC
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, magnitude FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -120 AND -100
SELECT id, depth FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude > 4 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude > 5 ORDER BY depth DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, magnitude FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY magnitude ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT latitude, longitude, magnitude FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE depth < 50 AND longitude > -100
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, depth FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE magnitude BETWEEN 4 AND 6 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM EarthquakeLocations WHERE depth > 100 AND magnitude > 6 ORDER BY magnitude DESC
